name: signIn
description: Sign into an account. Should set a session cookie.

name: signOut
description: Sign out of an account. Removes the session cookie.

name: updateAccount
description: Update account details. Account user and administrators only.

name: getAccount
description: View account details. Account user and administrators only.

name: getAccounts
description: Get a list of all accounts.

name: createIssue
description: Create a new issue. Shouldn't be visible until approved.

name: uploadImage
description: Submits a form with an image and returns the image URL
